JobFullDesc: Since 1992, Ciena has been driven by a relentless pursuit of network innovation.  We believe in a network that grows smarter, more agile, and more responsive every day. This means that when you digitally interact in your world - picking up the phone, streaming video, texting a friend or loved one – your interactions are being enabled by Ciena technologies.  Ciena makes your social / entertainment / business existence REAL.What will you do at Ciena?This role is focused on early in career engineers or new graduated.You will work as a Systems Engineer part of Global System Engineering Support Center to support NA and CALA Customer Projects & Bid Activity.The candidate is expected to work closely with Regional Sales Engieering (SE) teams to understand the Customer needs and propose viable specific and alternate Ciena Solutions to meet the requirements. Having proficiency on Network Design tools to evaluate options and determine and propose the best solutions matching the customer needs is highly valuable. The Candidate should be familiar with presentation tools and skilled in creating customer proposals, creating and delivering customer presentations and meeting tight deadlines.Responsibilities Solution Comparisons:Support the regional sales and SE’s with analysis and comparisons of various technical Solutions.Planning and validation:Perform Solution Design Simulations and Link Engineering to validate Network Designs on Ciena proprietary Network Design tools.Propose and validate design alternatives to fulfill customer requirementsRFP SupportSelf-sufficient to work on various RFx deliverables such as Link Engineered Design, BOQ, Product SOC responses and Technical Solution Documentation Customer presentations and demos:Configure and setup labs to showcase different product featuresPresent solutions to customers and answer relevant questions. The role is also responsible for providing Solution Consultancy and building intelligence around our go to market offerings. Must be able to understand customer requirements, RFP technical specs, convert into a cost-effective solution with constant focus on delivering the value of Ciena’s market leading packet-optical and Software portfolio. Desirable to have experience of customer presentations, and an understanding of customer networks and services.Collaboration with stakeholdersThis role supports the North America and CALA Customer Projects and Bid Activity focused on Ciena’s solutions.Key contributing member of the Ciena’s Global System Engineering Support center.  Education and Experience Bachelor degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science, or equivalent 2 to 4 years of experience in telecommunications industry with a particular focus on System/Sales Engineering operations.Technical knowledge in fiber optics transmission systems (especially OTN, SDH, DWDM), telecommunication networks and network management, service layers support and management.Networking knowledge CCNA level or higher is desiredDesired working knowledge or minimum exposure to Design tools used for Network design planning and Link Engineering.Strong PC skills including general knowledge of applications programs such as MS Office – particularly excel.Deadline driven and willing to work outside normal hours to complete tasks.Ability to understand customer needs and use technical expertise to develop customer solutions.Ability to work in matrix organizationAdvanced oral and written english levelOutstanding team playerGood communication skills, creativity and high energy.  Must have excellent written and presentation skillsMust also have strong interpersonal, analytical, and problem-solving skills.About Ciena Ciena is a network strategy and technology company with a passion to provide an experience, to you and our customers that is as rewarding as the outcome.   We attract the best and brightest– those with outstanding talent, motivation, and the right attitude to contribute to our success.
